titleStmt.title: Wits recreations. Selected from the finest fancies of moderne muses
titleStmt.author: Herbert, George, 1592-1637.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R[ichard] H[odgkinson and Thomas Paine] for Humphry Blunden at the Castle in Corn-hill,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, "Witts recreations", signed: W. Marshall sculpsit.
Signatures: pi² [A]⁴ B-L M⁴ 2A-2C; A-D E⁴.

"Outlandish proverbs, selected by Mr. G.H." (i.e. George Herbert) has separate dated title page with imprint "London, printed by T[homas]. P[aine]. for Humphrey Blunden ..". It was also issued separately.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
